trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_SEQ_00<tab>Wyd Lad's ears appear droopy even by Nu Mou standards.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Minfilia.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_TODO_01<tab>Obtain vials of invisible ink.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Minfilia.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the vials of invisible ink to Wyd Lad.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_000<tab>What? You...you would be my patron!?
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_001<tab>But...I can't do anything for you. The lawless ones took my invisible ink, and without it I can't make my arcane wares.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_002<tab>Who are the lawless ones? They're Nu Mou like us, except they've turned their backs on our values. Curs without honor, they are.

TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_003<tab>They refuse to work, instead spending all their time cavorting and making a nuisance of themselves. It was when I was outside for a walk that they set upon me and robbed me of my possessions, the ink included.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_004<tab>I was too weak to resist them...but you, mortal─you look quite strong. Do you think you could take my ink back from those villains?
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_005<tab>If you do this, I will consider it your patronage. And by way of my service, I will make you something very special!
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_RYNE_000_006<tab>E-Excuse me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I couldn't help overhearing. If you mean to undertake this task, will you let me accompany you?
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_RYNE_000_007<tab>I would learn from you...and help in what little way I can.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_A1_000_001<tab>You're welcome to join.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_A1_000_002<tab>Just don't get in the way.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_RYNE_000_008<tab>Thank you so much!
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_RYNE_000_009<tab>Thank you! I promise I won't be a burden!

TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_010<tab>The lawless ones make their lair to the south, inside a cave called Father Collard's Chambers. They took many vials of ink, and I would be grateful if you could bring as many back as possible.

TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_020<tab>The lawless ones make their lair to the south, inside a cave called Father Collard's Chambers. When they see you, they're like to attack on sight, so please take care!
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_RYNE_000_030<tab>Father Collard's Chambers is through here. I peered inside, and sure enough, it was milling with Nu Mou. They looked none too friendly.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_RYNE_000_031<tab>If Thancred were here, he'd tell me to go about it quietly and quickly. Let us split up.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_RYNE_000_032<tab>I'll find all the ink I can and then come back outside. See you shortly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDAENC_000_040<tab>Still offering your patronage to us? When you have a moment, I would speak with you all.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_050<tab>M-M-Mercy, Your Majesty! We had no choice! Please forgive us!
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_051<tab>...O-Oh, it's you. M-M-My ink─were you able to retrieve it?
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_052<tab>Haha! Yes, this is the ink, and almost all of it too!
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_053<tab>When our king spoke to me, my day went from bad to worse, but thanks to you it's simply bad again!
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_054<tab>What? You had the vision too? Oh, woe is us...

TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_055<tab>Ordinarily, when a living being turns into a sin eater, it loses everything about its mind that defined it. However, the king has retained some of their instincts.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_056<tab>This manifests in the desire to play and be free. So strong is that desire, it often leaks through the seal to invade our consciousness.
TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_057<tab>For a long time we've ignored it, but we can't do so forever...

TEXT_LUCKMB115_03316_WYDLAD_000_058<tab>But forgive me, I was going to thank you for reuniting me with my ink. You did exactly as I asked, so I will give you the service I promised. ...Ahem! Nothing up my sleeve, and...voilà! May it serve you well!
